markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knockback](/Feats.aspx?ID=5849) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 82 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
Your last action was a successful [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306).

</column>

---

The weight of your swing drives your enemy back. You [push](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the enemy back 5 feet, with the effects of a successful [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380). You can follow the enemy as normal for a successful Shove.

<title level="2">Knockback leads to...</title>
[Awesome Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=5862)
name: Knockback
requirement: Your last action was a successful  Strike .
requirement_markdown: Your last action was a successful [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306).
